305483.「見てください。今にも つぼみが\n 花開きそうです。ついに 新しい命が\n 生:
Look at this! The bud is about to bloom at
any moment. A new life will be born at last!

305484.「<pc>。\n あなたにも この声が聞こえていないのですか？: Are you also hearing that voice, <pc>?

305485.「そうですか……。私には はっきりと\n この つぼみから 私を呼ぶ声が\n 聞:
I see... I can clearly hear a voice from this
bud calling out to me...

305486.「どうやら その子の名付け親に\n 選ばれたようだね。:
Looks to me that this child has chosen you
as its benefactor.

305488.「転生の花から 新たな命が生まれるとき\n 赤子は 天使たちの中から ひとりを選:
When new life is born from a Rebirth Flower,
the baby chooses one angel to announce
its birth.

305489.「前世の記憶は失っているが 無意識に 魂が\n ゆかりのある者を 呼ぶのではない:
While the memories of their past life are lost, it's said that their souls unconsciously call out to those they share a connection
with.

305490.「そうして 呼ばれた者が 赤子を取り上げ\n 名付け親に なるんだ。\n さあ:
Whoever it calls out to will take the baby
and become its benefactor. Go on and
hold them.

305493.「この少しカゲのある やさしい ほほえみは\n お姉様に ちがいないです！\n:
This sly but gentle smile...this is no doubt
Helvel!
I see...so you've returned to us.

305494.「あなたには お姉様の名前の一部をもらって\n ヴェルという名を 与えましょう。:
I will give you the name Vel, which is just
a part of your previous name.

305495.「お帰りなさい ヴェル。\n また あなたと共に 過ごす人生が\n よろこびで:
Welcome home, Vel. May the life we share
together be filled with much joy and
happiness.

305496.「末永く すこやかであることを 願う。\n ルティアナ様の ご加護が あらんこと:
I wish you a long and healthy life. May the
blessings of Lutiana always be with you.

305497.「お姉様は 幼い頃から 私に\n いろいろなことを 教えてくれました。\n 今度:
Helvel taught me many things since I was just
a child. This time, I want to be the one to
guide you...

305498.「天使長……どうか 私に\n この子を 育てさせてください。:
Archangel... Please allow me to raise this
child!

305499.「そして……先ほど お話しいただいた\n 審判の天使のお役目 引き受けたく思いま:
Also... I would like the accept the role of an
Angel of Judgment that you mentioned before.
I'll do my very best for the sake of Vel here.

305500.「ああ そうしておやり。\n この子も それを望んでいるだろうよ。:
Yeah, go right on ahead.
I'm sure that's what she wants, too.

305502.「これまで 幾度となく 同胞が転生する瞬間を\n 目にしてきたが いつ見ても\n:
I've seen many reincarnations throughout my
life, and it's always a heartwarming sight.

305503.「……っと そういえば\n お前に まだ 礼をしていなかったな。: Oh...that reminds me. I've yet to thank you.

305504.「お前のおかげで 審判の天使たちは\n 気力を 取り戻し\n 新たな道を 見つけ:
It's thanks to you that the Angels of Judgment
have regained their strength and found new
paths.

305505.「ありがとうよ。\n さあ これを 受け取ってくれ。: Thanks a ton. Here, I want you to have this.

305506.「<pc> 私からも お礼を\n 言わせてください。今回のことだけでなく\n あ:
I want to thank you too, <pc>.
I can't count the number of times that you've
helped me.

305507.「お姉様が転生する この日を\n あなたと共に 迎えられてよかった。\n 本当に:
I'm glad that we could share this day of
Helvel's reincarnation together.
Thank you so much, really!

305508.「お前は ユーライザが見込んだとおり\n 誰よりも 英雄に ふさわしい存在だった:
Just as Yuliza predicted, you were more worthy
of being a champion than anyone else.

305509.「真の英雄とは……お前のように 決して\n くじけることなく 人々の光であり続け:
A true champion is someone like you... A
person who never falters, and continues to be
a shining beacon for everyone.

305510.「この先 お前が どんな道を歩もうとも\n 我ら天使は いつでも 見守っているよ:
No matter the path you decide to take in the
future, just know that we angels will always
watch over you.

305511.「……さてと。\n 私は 次の仕事に 取りかかるとしよう。:
Now then...
I'd best be getting on with my next task.

305512.「願わくば これから始まる\n 新たな神の候補者探しでも また\n お前のような:
As we search for more candidates to become new
gods, hopefully we will find another champion
like you.
